changeSet.author: Greg
changeSet.createView: select * from user_areas as areas LEFT JOIN (select a.user_area_id as id, string_agg(a.scope, '|') as scopes from (select user_area_id, '#'||scope_name||'#' as scope from user_scope group by scope, user_area_id) as a group by a.user_area_id) as area_scopes ON areas.gid = area_scopes.id

changeSet.author: dubduan
changeSet.createView: select * from user_areas areas LEFT JOIN (select a.user_area_id as id, LISTAGG(a.scope, '|') WITHIN GROUP (order by a.scope) scopes from (select user_area_id, '#'||scope_name||'#' scope from user_scope group by scope_name, user_area_id) a group by a.user_area_id) area_scopes ON areas.gid = area_scopes.id
